name: Rotato
description:
Mr Rotato doesn't have the ability to jump... but he has another very special ability. He is able to warp space and gravity to rotate the entire universe around him. Use this to you're advantage to get through the levels!

Controls:

  • A and D to move left and right
  • Left and Right arrows to rotate the world (make sure you have enough Rotato charges though...)
  • Hold R to restart the level

 WIP:

  • Currently only 2 levels
  • Art is not final
  • Feedback is welcome
